knimeNode.name: Block Programmatically (Table)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Used in unit tests to pause the execution until a programmatic "release" is triggered.

intro.p: Used in unit tests to pause the execution until a programmatic "release" is triggered. This node is part of the workflow manager test framework. It's used to simulate a long processing job. It uses a java.util.concurrent.Lock object to stall. Using this node makes only sense if used in unit tests. In normal KNIME execution this node will just pass the input to the output.

fullDescription.option: ID of the lock being used. Must be present in the global lock repository (i.e. programmatically added beforehand).
